sys_ui_macro.name: Test
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

	<g2:evaluate var="jvar_answer">	
		var btn = '';
		var gr1 = new GlideRecord('x_tekso_twxapp01_button_visibility');
		gr1.query();
		if (gr1.next()) {
			btn = gr1.getValue('start_button');
		}
		gs.info('btn: ' + btn);
		btn;
	</g2:evaluate>
		

	<j2:if test="$[jvar_answer == 'Show']">		
		<button id="button" onclick="button()" style="color:blue">$[jvar_answer]</button>		
		<button id="back" class="btn btn-default" type="button" style="color:blue" onclick="window.history.back()">Back</button>	
	</j2:if>

	<j2:if test="$[jvar_answer == 'Hidden']">		
		<button id="button" onclick="button()" style="color:red">$[jvar_answer]</button>		
		<button id="back" class="btn btn-default" type="button" style="color:red" onclick="window.history.back()">Back</button>	
	</j2:if>
	
<script>
       	 function button() {}
</script>
</j:jelly>

sys_update_version.name: sys_ui_macro_398d9200dbd3c4104f29252b139619b0
sys_update_version.payload:
